title: Looking For Players For Ranked Teams
body: If you want to join my ranked team put your favourite roles and champion pool down below. We accept people of all ranks and we will participate in tournaments.

replies.body:
mid main . fizz zed tf lis grag kas vic riven
IGN vbulldogz

Main adc - Bronze 2 
Main champs - Jinx, Caitlyn, Lucian, Graves, Sivir

Can play the other roles as well

Main support - silver 4 , main champions used in order 

Lulu - Janna - Nami - Sona - Karma - Braum - Thresh - Shen - (if im with a vayne and need a tank, sometimes nunu) 

can do other roles fairly well except jungle
 
you can add me as TwoTails
